tool_description: Our API lets you discover your own or your visitors public IP address
name: What Is My IP
title: What Is My IP

api_list.name: IP
api_list.description: Returns the IP address as a JSON
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://what-is-my-ip.p.rapidapi.com/ip"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "what-is-my-ip.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://what-is-my-ip.p.rapidapi.com/ip"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "what-is-my-ip.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
